thread.title: U.S. is at risk of a ‘revenue recession’
thread.title_full: U.S. is at risk of a ‘revenue recession’ - MarketWatch

author: By     MarketWatch
title: U.S. is at risk of a ‘revenue recession’
text:
MARKETWATCH FRONT PAGE The bigger problem with the second-quarter earnings season is not the impact of strong dollar, or fall oil prices, but companies’ inability to generate sales in a low-growth environment, according to analysts See full story.
Global freezing: A ‘mini ice age’ is on the way by 2030, scientists say European scientists warn that by 2030, a decade of winters with extended freezing temperatures could bring about a “mini ice age” the likes of which hasn’t been seen in 370 years. See full story.
6 things you learned in school, but your kids never will Your children won’t be learning how to write in cursive, or how to get someone out in dodgeball. See full story.
This map puts America in a time warp Montana or Texas? The past and future of the U.S. population breakdown. See full story.
Has the cable-cutting revolution finally arrived? Comcast will offer a broadcast TV streaming service for $15 a month. See full story.
MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE China, where driving a Buick and drinking a PBR are signs you’ve made it. See full story.
